byline.original: By MARK SCOTT and NICOLA CLARK

abstract: Rivals British Airways and Virgin Atlantic are both in talks with German carrier Lufthansa over deal to buy troubled airline BMI.
snippet: Virgin Atlantic confirmed that it was in talks with the German carrier Lufthansa, the parent company of BMI, over a deal for the troubled airline.
lead_paragraph: Virgin Atlantic confirmed that it was in talks with the German carrier Lufthansa, the parent company of BMI, over a deal for the troubled airline.

headline.main: Virgin Atlantic and British Airways Compete Over BMI
headline.print_headline: Virgin Atlantic and British Airways Compete Over BMI
